class.name: BTRunLimit
class.brief_description: BT decorator that restricts the execution of its child a limited number of times.
class.description: BTRunLimit restricts the execution of the child task to a maximum number of times, defined by [member run_limit]. Returns [code]FAILURE[/code] if the limit on executions is exceeded; otherwise, it returns the status of the child task.

members.member: The maximum number of times the child is permitted to be executed.
